thread.title: Barbara Underwood Is Named New York Attorney General

author: Corinne Ramey
title: Barbara Underwood Is Named New York Attorney General

locations.name: new york attorney general new york

text:
New York lawmakers Tuesday appointed Barbara Underwood as the state’s 66th attorney general, making her the first woman to hold the position and allowing her to serve as the state’s top prosecutor through the end of this year.
Under New York law, the state legislature is charged with filling the position, which abruptly became vacant this month following the resignation of Attorney General Eric Schneiderman.
